original_title: Μακάριοι Αυτοί Που Τον Θεό Εποίησαν
overview: Nick saw a dream about God's suicide. The day after dream he goes to his work and has a conversation with his boss about the dream.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: God Bless the Creators of Yourself
